channel.title: Question about one of my Albums
channel.description: So, a few months back, I released an album called "Night of the Neon" on SoundCloud, which consisted of all the original demos in the older version of Auxy. So I was wondering if it's okay to completely rename it to "The Auxy Riot Remixes" and change the song names and cover images, just to avoid copyright. @Auxy

item.title: Question about one of my Albums
item.dc:creator: RazerFireRiot
item.description:
Mainly just organized them and remixed it

Read full topic

But we’ll wait and see what @Auxy says first
